description: This is a main source file for a Flutter application. It sets up the main app widget and a home page with a simple UI displaying a message and a progress indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, setting up MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: A stateful widget representing the home screen, which displays a title and basic progress UI.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage, building a Scaffold with an app bar and centered content.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the Flutter application, runs the MyApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp, MyHomePage, and _MyHomePageState classes.
